title: Never in my fucking life do I want to see another fucking kat in game
body:
I would rather forget it, but this fucking whore bitch that has been abused while no one realizes for the past 2-3 years pentaklling every1s ass every game up until now. While she whore's the most attention which gives me Aids, shes fucking everywhere whoring all the attention, in the Codes Section background in shop, in the fucking Boards background, in the fucking Loading Icon store,  In every single cinematic Video, In every LoL AD, and the list just keeps on going on...  Oh and she has 3 fucking legacy skin while with 5 skins like if it wasn't enough already...

Why does Riot have such a favourtism to Kat? Because "Muh flagship"   

Please gut....
